abstract: Roche‘s bid for the rest of Genentech isn’t creating anywhere near the hoopla that greeted InBev‘s offer for Anheuser-Busch. It’s understandable: While many consider Genentech, of South San Francisco, the most successful biotech company on the planet, it doesn’t quite have the brand recognition of Anheuser, which makes Budweiser beer.
lead_paragraph: Roche‘s bid for the rest of Genentech isn’t creating anywhere near the hoopla that greeted InBev‘s offer for Anheuser-Busch. It’s understandable: While many consider Genentech, of South San Francisco, the most successful biotech company on the planet, it doesn’t quite have the brand recognition of Anheuser, which makes Budweiser beer.
